channel.title: Frustrating problem
channel.description:
:mad:
i have read the sticky about what to do if u can't log on but i still cant log on to any server I updated my java when mopar was first installed I have hamachi and had no problem connecting with the network with many different networks connected I have tried over 20 different servers today and none have worked I did check the ip and the port and they were correc each time
if anyone can help me it would be very much appreciated and sorry to have to end up posting it here

r u making a servver or trying to get on one

item.title: Frustrating problem
item.dc:creator: @s4nta s4nta
item.description:
@s4nta wrote:

Read the advertisements first, they may need hamachi… And you were not using it… Try connecting to ones which say “hamachi:NO!” as you won’t need to use hamachi

Read full topic

mabe there down just keep trying it happens to me all the time just keep on and u will get on one ;D

i have read the sticky about what to do if u can’t log on but i still cant log on to any server
I updated my java when mopar was first installed
I have hamachi and had no problem connecting with the network with many different networks connected
I have tried over 20 different servers today and none have worked
I did check the ip and the port and they were correc each time

if anyone can help me it would be very much appreciated and sorry to have to end up posting it here
